name: Bomb Bluff Boom Blast (Thirrash, As Soon As Impossible, Flavo Entertainment)
name_original: Bomb Bluff Boom Blast (Thirrash, As Soon As Impossible, Flavo Entertainment)
description:
Gather your friends and enjoy this couch co-op game with Last Car Driving mode! Choose one from 3 unique vehicles and watch your opponents explode on your favorite map!

Last Car Driving
Your task is to survive longer than your enemies. 
Every now and then one of the players receives bomb, who has to give it to one of the opponents before time runs out. You can be killed either by bomb's explosion or by driving outside of game arena.

Powerups
Once you collect Atom, you can spend it on one of the 4 powerups:
Nitro, Jump, Oil Spill & Boxing Punch.

Spectator
When you die the game is not over! You can still harass other players by spawning bombs which can throw enemies out of the arena, which gives you some bonus points.

Game supports up to 4 players (1 keyboard + 3 joysticks)
